semantics.description: ENFORCED: in every interval where flight_mode holds. TRIGGER: first point in the interval if (conflict_detected) is true and any point in the interval where (conflict_detected) becomes true (from false). REQUIRES: for every trigger, RES must hold at some point with distance <=10 from the trigger, except if the end of the interval occurs sooner.
